channel.title: Having Webclient trouble Loader.class (NotFoundException)
channel.description:
I pasted this HTML code on my website: [code]<html> <body> <body bgcolor="black"> <title>LostRealm718 Webclient</title> <applet name=client width=100% height=100% archive 'https://www.dropbox.com/s/sbla3iyw5kb532p/Client.jar' code='Loader.class'> </applet> </body> </html>[/code]
I seem to be having trouble with the Loader.class part because I get this error: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/303lp2v.jpg[/img]
So I tried to copy the Loader.class file from my client files into my C:/ drive and it still didn't fix it. I signed and Jar'd my client properly and also have my archived cache and unarchived cache in my C:/ drive.
I have followed 3 tutorials on youtube and a few other guides on forums on here and nothing seems to fix this error. I have uninstalled and reinstalled java, clean registry errors, reloaded cache. I am not sure what is wrong can somebody please help me or teamview me?

I seem to be having trouble with the Loader.class part because I get this error:

So I tried to copy the Loader.class file from my client files into my C:/ drive and it still didn’t fix it. I signed and Jar’d my client properly and also have my archived cache and unarchived cache in my C:/ drive.

I have followed 3 tutorials on youtube and a few other guides on forums on here and nothing seems to fix this error.
I have uninstalled and reinstalled java, clean registry errors, reloaded cache.
I am not sure what is wrong can somebody please help me or teamview me?[/quote]i got this error with a windows 8 and idk if you’re using a windows 8, but what i did was i had to take my anti-virus off and it made it work, or you have to run the java as a different thing usually you have to right click the jar file and go to open with and there should be 2 options of java and try both of them(:
